articles.title: Does that 2% pay raise mean federal employees are chumps? - Federal News Network
articles.description: Boeing, where union workers turned down 35% pay hikes, is in big trouble. Both its commercial and defense sides are losing money, just as China comes on.
articles.content:
Federal employees facing a whopping 2% pay raise next year likely won’t lick their chops over the prospect. But you’ll keep working. Does that make you a chump?
